Room.Name: Islandia Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are travelling along Islandia Drive, between Jeane's Glass and Glazing on the north and Hansel's General Provisions and Supplies on the south.
Room.LongDescription: Jeane's Glass and Glazing provides much, if not all, of the glass products in the realm. Glass is expensive to manufacture, and only the finest, richest houses even have glass. Hansel's General Provisions and Supplies shop provides essentials for travelling beyond Oceancrest. Travelers usually stop off here before continuing on.
